item.title: jaeger-operator
item.description:
Description

jaeger-operator Helm chart for Kubernetes

  • https://github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger-operator

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
jaeger-operator default âŒ â€” 33 1 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ğŸ¤– jaeger-operator

Namespace: default Â |Â  Automount: âŒ

ğŸ”‘ Permissions (33)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags
Role jaeger-operator apps/daemonsets create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Critical NodeAccess Persistence PrivilegeEscalation Tampering WorkloadLifecycle
Role jaeger-operator core/secrets create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Critical CredentialAccess DataExposure InformationDisclosure Persistence PotentialPrivilegeEscalation (+2 more)
Role jaeger-operator core/configmaps create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch High ConfigMapAccess DataExposure InformationDisclosure PotentialPrivilegeEscalation Tampering
Role jaeger-operator batch/cronjobs create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch High Persistence PotentialPrivilegeEscalation Tampering WorkloadLifecycle
Role jaeger-operator apps/deployments create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch High Persistence PotentialPrivilegeEscalation Tampering WorkloadLifecycle
Role jaeger-operator networking.k8s.io/ingresses create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch High DenialOfService NetworkManipulation ServiceExposure Tampering

Role jaeger-operator core/services create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch High DenialOfService NetworkManipulation ServiceExposure Tampering
Role jaeger-operator apps/statefulsets create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch High Persistence PotentialPrivilegeEscalation Tampering WorkloadLifecycle
Role jaeger-operator core/serviceaccounts create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Medium IdentityManagement PotentialPrivilegeEscalation Tampering

item.title: jenkins
item.description:
Description

Jenkins - Build great things at any scale! As the leading open source automation server, Jenkins provides over 2000 plugins to support building, deploying and automating any project.
